title: Make Informed Crypto Investments - Rekt Capital Newsletter
content:
Hey there!

How did you start trading/investing?

I remember when I first started, I had some fundamental understanding, but I lacked key TA principles, strategies and risk management know-how.

Back then, I would’ve loved guidance on this from reputable investors and teachers.

After learning and figuring it out, I got better and better, and that led me to share what I know in my courses.

If you’ve not picked them up yet, I’d like to encourage you to do so.

Right now, and for a limited time, there's a special offer on all my courses.

In a few days, course prices will nearly double!

🔥Cryptocurrency Technical Analysis Course ($149):A comprehensive 17-hour course covering over 10 TA tools for beginners and intermediate traders and investors.

🔥Altcoin Investing Course ($199):A 9-module course designed to help you understand and navigate the Altcoin market.

🔥Bitcoin Investing Course ($199):A 10-module course to guide you through Bitcoin Market Cycles and identify potential investment opportunities.

🔥Cryptocurrency Risk Management Course ($249):This course will reveal to you my own personal risk management frame work and most importantly help you create your own risk management strategy using various tools.

🔥Rekt Capital Masterclass ($499):Get access to all courses in one bundle!

All of my courses are rated at least 4.8, 4.9, or 5/5 on Gumroad.

So no doubt you’ll find it helpful!

Reminder: This offer expires soon! ⏳

Recommended Course: Masterclass Bundle

Or buy an Individual Course.

Thanks for reading,

Rekt Capital
